# Your Experts in Swift App Development

We are BrightDigit a Swift-Based App Development headed by @leogdion

## Who We Are & What We Do

BrightDigit was created with the idea that great apps are made by thinking ahead.
Founded in 2012 by Leo Dion, a software developer with over 20 years‚Äô experience, BrightDigit has focused on building high-quality apps for Apple devices.
We specialize in building apps using Swift and exploring all the new opportunities in the growing Apple software market.

- [#chatgpt and  #softwaredevelopment #macos #swiftui](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWydCbbIj6o)
<!-- YOUTUBE-VIDEO:END -->

## We also love helping people learn and grow as developers

There are so many great people doing cool things with Swift, and we like to help them find the <a href="https://brightdigit.com/articles">best patterns</a> and <a href="https://brightdigit.com/tutorials">practices</a> to build the best possible software.

You learn more about <a href="https://brightdigit.com/tutorial">coding</a> and <a href="https://brightdigit.com/articles">best practices</a> for Swift development through our <a href="https://brightdigit.com/podcast">podcast, videos,</a> and <a href="https://brightdigit.com/tutorials">online resources.</a>

Livestream Your Health Stats Straight From Your Apple Watch.

Heartwitch is a combination Apple Watch and Web App for sharing your health data online.
Video game live streaming has become a mainstream form of entertainment, with viewers liking to see how streamers behave and react to gameplay. With Heartwitch, viewers can see how the streamer reacts on a physical level.
See the streamer‚Äôs heart rate shift when hiding from a monster, driving a racecar around a tight bend, or as their favorite character dies in their arms.
Unlike other apps that capture user health data, there is no need for extra hardware. It uses the built-in sensors of the Apple Watch to detect your heart rate and send it through our servers directly to your web browser.

### [Bushel](https://getbushel.app)

**Create Unbreakable macOS Apps**

Bushel is the macOS virtual machine app for developers who want to be rigorous and uncompromising in their app testing. Bushel is focused on giving you the complete, native capabilities of the operating system for all your testing requirements.
